title: LF Low-Mid Diamond players for teams
body:
Looking to put a team together for season 8 to compete in tournaments, Lans if possible and the new clash mode etc.

Currently looking for Top,Mid & Botlane

Requirements

Working Mic
Discord
Diamond 5+ (depending on the turn out will consider mid high plats)
Champ pool (willing to learn more champions to suit team comps.)
Able to participate in practice and scrims.

To apply feel free to reply here or jump into the discord server
https://discord.gg/N9zuskq
Thanks

replies.body:
Hi im silver but deserve challenger, can i join?

I main yasuo and riven adc
